jobDescription: DescriptionA Service Field Tech (Field Technician II) Provides superior field support on RbA products by performing serviceSERVICE RESPONSIBILITIESService and repair previously installed RbA products; Analyzes customers situations, determine corrective action to be taken and verify the action has fixed the situation is as efficient and cost effective manner as possible; keep team members informed as needed of customer interactions and actions takenFollows established Renewal processes, making recommendations for process improvement; keeps current on RbA product and installation process changes; recommends, and may write, technical tips for Renewal installation or service; helps maintain an updated service procedure manualKeeps service area neat and organized; inventory service stock area of warehouse; request material replenishment as needed; provide detailed information to CSR'sQualificationsQUALIFICATION AND SKILL REQUIREMENTS:High school diploma.2 to 3 years experience with window installation preferredWork experience with basic construction techniques; good knowledge of basic construction and building materials; knowledge of the terminology of the industry.Demonstrated interpersonal communication skills; strong listening & empathy skillsDemonstrated ability to confidently handle confrontation/conflicts using a tactful and diplomatic approach; Ability to maintain perspective under demanding conditions.Diagnostic skills: assessment, problem solving and decision makingOrganizational skills for managing work schedules, job priorities, and stock levels.Basic math skills; legible writing.Initiative; ability to work independently. Flexibility; Willingness to work variable work schedules
